original_text: Nobody has ever made the eyes of a blind man able to see, if that man had been blind when he was born. Since the world began, that has never happened!
korean_text: 창세 이후로 맹인으로 난 자의 눈을 뜨게 하였다 함을 듣지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: Nobody has ever made the eyes of a blind man able to see
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 소경의 눈을 볼 수 있게 만든 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: if that man had been blind when he was born

sentences.korean_translation: 그런 일은 결코 일어난 적이 없다!
